review: I dropped my phone on a Friday afternoon and less than 24 hours later you would never know. Jacob was amazing. He answered right away and scheduled my appointment. Jacob is friendly, professional and finished the job  before my toddler finished his first round at the park. Oh and he also gave me a complimentary screen protector!
name: Mari V.

review: I highly recommend these guys!  I shattered my iPhone 6 screen last night.  I was researching what to do and originally contacted another company...who didn't pick up their phone or return my email for a few hours.  I saw Jacob's company on Yelp and he answered my call right away.  He was very pleasant and and said he could be at my house in an hour.  He was able to fix my screen right away and couldn't be nicer.  His prices were in line with other companies but it was great he came to me (no extra charge), was responsive and used Apple parts.  Thanks!
name: Holly D.

review: Showed up early and fixed my screen quickly for a fair price! What more can you ask for?
name: Jeff D.
